this.setState({ firstnameFocus: true }) } onBlur={(e) => this.setState({ firstnameFocus: false }) } /> this.setState({ lastnameFocus: true }) } onBlur={(e) => this.setState({ lastnameFocus: false }) } />

); } } export default LoginPage;
